pullrequest.title: Logging speed improvement: add zlib option for compression (fix #682)

content.html:
Thanks for the tip about files ...

My friend to trigger the bug is:

while (true); do ./test/regression/logrecord_stress; done

Modified version for testing is to increase the number of loop cycles, which should focus the test on start/stop. I didn't see this version failing:

TEST(logrecord_stress, StartStopStressing)
{
  EXPECT_NO_THROW(
    gazebo::util::LogRecord *recorder = gazebo::util::LogRecord::Instance();
    recorder->Init("test");

    for (int j = 0; j < 10000; ++j)
    {
      recorder->Start();
      recorder->Stop();
    }
  );
}
